---
id: stop-listening
title: StopListening
description: >-
  In walkie-talkie mode, the AI agent stops listening. For enabling
  walkie-talkie mode, please refer to the AdvancedConfig.CommunicationMode
  parameter description in [Create Agent
  Instance](/aiagent-server/api-reference/agent-instance-management/create-agent-instance).
api: >-
  
info_path: >-
  core_products/aiagent/en/server/api-reference/agent-instance-control/open-api-desc
date: '2026-02-05'
---

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>StopListening</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/"}></MethodEndpoint>


In walkie-talkie mode, the AI agent stops listening. For enabling walkie-talkie mode, please refer to the AdvancedConfig.CommunicationMode parameter description in [Create Agent Instance](/aiagent-server/api-reference/agent-instance-management/create-agent-instance).
## Request
